ygData.subject: Re: BlackStorm or Nightlight?/Investigating the Caveman
ygData.msgSnippet: The Caveman watched the robot speak. Specifically his mouth. He could understand them but wasn t sure how, he tried to form a sentence of his own. W..w..who?

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

The Caveman watched the robot speak. Specifically his mouth. He could 
understand them but wasn't sure how, he tried to form a sentence of his own. 
"W..w..who? D...Den..Den..Denzab..b..Denzabar." Was all that came out.

--part1_3b.3dce46e9.2ca41382_boundary
